snippet.title: Rising Heat | Co-Op Trailer | Play the Demo Now in Steam Next Fest!
snippet.description:
Try the Free Demo Now on Steam! http://apo.gg/RisingHeat 💥
Enter the Rising Heat tournament, a high-stakes, gladiator-style spaceship battle where only the strongest pilots survive! Dodge bullet storms, ram enemies at high speed, and unlock devastating roguelike upgrades to craft the perfect build.

⚡ Fast-Paced Horde Action – Face relentless waves of robotic enemies and take down massive multi-stage bosses.
🛠 Customize & Upgrade – Choose from 60+ ship upgrades, fuse powerful synergies, and optimize your build every run.
🤜 Momentum-Based Combat – Use dynamic movement to dash, dodge, and crash into enemies for massive damage.
👨‍🚀 Pick Your Pilot & Ship – Each with unique abilities, stats, and playstyles.
🎮 CO-OP MODE! – Team up with a friend and harness a deadly energy tether to obliterate enemies together.

-

DISCORD: ► https://discord.gg/apogee
X / TWITTER: ► https://twitter.com/apogee_ent
THREADS: ► https://threads.net/apogeeentertainment
BLUESKY: ►https://bsky.app/profile/apogeeent.com
INSTAGRAM: ► https://www.instagram.com/apogeeentertainment/
FACEBOOK: ► https://www.facebook.com/ApogeeEntertainment
TIKTOK: ► https://www.tiktok.com/@apogeeentertainment
TIKTOK: ► https://www.tiktok.com/@apogeeentertainment

-

Produced & Directed by Haydn Steffes & Kyle Blessing
Edited by Kyle Blessing
Footage capture by UnderTheMayo
Trailer Music Composer: Chipper Hammond
Quest Master Theme by Chipper Hammond
Additional Audio & SFX Support: Brent Houston
Executive Producer: Jeron Moore
